title: Black&White projects 4 elements
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $49.00 Giveaway of the day — Black&White projects 4 elements Give your photos a 100% analogue finish with high-res film emulations! User rating: 4 (50%) 4 (50%) 1 comment 
Black&White projects 4 elements is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now Black&White projects 4 elements Terms and conditions 
BLACK&WHITE projects 4 is the perfect tool to enable all photographers with a special affinity for black and white photos to make their creative mark. The new spectral sensitivity engine allows you to grasp the grey value for every converted colour and customise it to any tone value. The 80 handcrafted presets offer you a plethora of options from your images’ hidden information. Give your picture a 100% analogue finish with high-res film emulations adapted from classics like Ilford, Kodak, Rollei and Fuji. New algorithms for perfect monochrome filter emulations; Brighten and enhance details; Strong expressions, even with difficult lighting situations.   
Minimum: Windows 10/8/7 (32 Bit); Prozessor Core Duo; 2 GB HDD; 1.280 x 1024 Pixels Screen Resolution; Graphic: DirectX-8-compatible, 128 MB, 32 bit colour depth Publisher:
